mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_schedule (user_id, pet_id, type, title, memo, datetime, place) VALUES (#{userId}, #{petId}, #{type}, #{title}, #{memo}, #{datetime}, #{place})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, pet_id, type, title, memo, datetime, place FROM tbl_schedule WHERE pet_id = #{petId} AND type = 1
SELECT id, user_id, pet_id, type, title, memo, datetime, place from tbl_schedule WHERE pet_id = #{petId} AND type = 2

SELECT id, user_id, pet_id, type, title, memo, datetime, place from tbl_schedule WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATETIME BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())
